name: False Prophets
description:
:
2-Player Arena Conversion Simulator
(1 gamepad required!)

Controls for Xbox Controler:
Use left analog to walk around
Press A/LShift to cast attracting apell when mana meter is above 50% (hold for greater range)
Press B/Spacebar to leave blocking "spiritual" wall.

Collect purple mana glyphs to replenish mana.
Lead the sinners to your Sigil.
Collect 8 sinners to win over the Rival Prophet!

Game created during Epic MegaJam by:

  • Adam Andrzejczak - programming, vfx, sfx, production
  • Julian Guercio - environment, level design
  • Grzegorz Paluch - animations
  • Alicja Symela - 3D Graphics

Special thanks to:

ZaQ, Jacek Dębowski & Yashar for play testing and support
